text: Making the Filling Prepare the vegetable filling ingredients. Dry fry all of the prepared vegetables in a frying pan. Add the seasonings. Place the Quorn mince in another pan, heated first.  Add boiling water. Place into the Quorn mince pan the vegetable stock cubes, chopped tomatoes and tomato juice. Then add the concentrated tomato puree, tomato ketchup, sugar (to counteract the acidity of the tomato ketchup, and tomato puree and tomato juice). Add the 2 crushed cloves of garlic. Making the Potato Topping Prepare the topping. Boil the quartered, peeled potatoes in salted water for 25 minutes. Drain and add the margarine or butter, pepper, and grated cheese. Also add the French mustard,  and a good splash of milk. Mash and beat potato mixture until smooth. Making up the Shepherd's Pie Add the vegetable mix to the Quorn mince and stock mixture. Cook and simmer for 25 minutes. Transfer to an oven dish. Ensure it comes with a good soaking of stock, then add the potato mix on top and another sprinkle of grated cheese for topping. Bake for 30 minutes. Remove when cooked, wearing oven mitts. Serve immediately and enjoy. It can be served on diner's plates or placed on a trivet in the center of the table and diners can help themselves to it.
